CustomField.description: Determines how this agent handles tool execution errors. Fail-Fast: Any tool error immediately fails the agent execution. Autonomous Recovery: Agent attempts to handle errors via LLM reasoning. Individual capabilities can override this with FailFastOnError__c flag.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Controls error handling behavior: Fail-Fast stops immediately on any tool error. Autonomous Recovery allows the LLM to adapt and continue. Critical tools can override this setting.
CustomField.label: Error Handling Policy
